definition: to consider past cause and future effect (idiom); to think over the past and future/to ponder over reasons and connection
to think/to consider
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
back/behind/rear/afterwards/after/later/post-

sentences.english: It is best to login or register first but you may post as a guest.
sentences.chinese: 只有半天時間，思前想後，還是再來六本木山一趟。

sentences.english: Season often focused on writing and playing fingerprints;
sentences.chinese: 季常思前想後，終畫押和打手印。

sentences.english: Don't stall or stress over whether you're doing the right thing.
sentences.chinese: 不要爲自己的作爲是否正確而思前想後，緊張不安。

sentences.english: Zhe line focused, feel the whole thing is not simple.
sentences.chinese: 哲行思前想後，感覺到整件事情並不單純。

sentences.english: After thinking it over, or talk about some of his hobbies bar.
sentences.chinese: 思前想後還是講一下自己的某些興趣愛好吧。

sentences.english: I'd given one man and thought it too much, while he gave four without grudging them.
sentences.chinese: 我獻出一個人便思前想後，他獻出了四個卻毫無怨言。

definition: to keep silent
to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
to have no other choice
to force someone to do something
to make a big fuss over a minor issue (idiom)
every hope turns to dust (idiom); completely disheartened
to stake all on one throw
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
to feel embarrassed/to feel akward
to sound out the difficulties and retreat to avoid defeat (idiom); fig. to back out of an awkward situation/to get out on finding out what it's really like
a golden house to keep one's mistress (idiom); a magnificent house built for a beloved woman
to spin a cocoon around oneself (idiom); enmeshed in a trap of one's own devising/hoist by his own petard
to think for oneself and act accordingly (idiom); to act on one's own initiative
dejected/disheartened/listless
false alarm/panic rumor/CL:場|场[chang2]
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
